ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Most animals, even greenies, see invis.  Green sabertooths and green lions in Antonica both see me invis. ;-( Good news is that the rhinos and sabertooths are
ygData.messageBody:
Most animals, even greenies, see invis. Green sabertooths and green lions
in Antonica both see me invis. ;-(

Good news is that the rhinos and sabertooths are no aggressive despite their
con. Not sure about the cockatri.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 2:08 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions


>The giants in Frontier Mountains are unusual. There are plenty of mobs
>higher level than them that cannot see invis. In particular the lvl 33-39
>Sarnaks in Overthere cannot. I have run around and been surprised actually
>that more things don't see thru invis.

The Sarnaks in OVerthere don't see invis. But the rhinos, Cockatrices, and
cats wandering
around con VERY red to this lvl 26 enchanter :( And ready to attack.
